"It's up to you where we start." Deemos said to Wrath...
  ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sa=
turday, July 22, 2000 4:27 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Wrath nods=
 and smiles* Wrath: Where should start? *Wrath asks Inzola and Deemos*
    =
----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars=



    "Hunting? We hunted down almost everyone already, but sure, we'll co=
me." Inzola said.

    "Good to practice with our new beast modes." Deemos =
said. He patted Wrath on the shoulder.

    "Those Alliance and Preds will =
be sorry they wouldn't let us join!" Deemos said. Inzola looked at Wrath.

=
    "The Maximals, most of them just don't got it, but a few stand out, you=
 are one of those few." Inzola said to Wrath...
      ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      S=
ent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  =
    *Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well......We can go scouting...hmm....I've haven'=
t had much to do...We go hunting? *Wrath asks Deemos and Inzola*
        --=
--- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
        Subject: Re: =
Neo Beast Wars


        Inzola smiles and shakes Wrath's hand.

        "N=
ice to meet such a charming and powerful bot upon my repair." Inzola said. =
Deemos and Inzola hugged for about 5 seconds and then looked back to Wrath.=


        "So, what are we supposed to do right now?" Deemos asked Wrath...=

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
 =
         To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12=
:53 AM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Wrath: I am Wrath =
and you must be the Inzola that Deemos spoke about. A pleasure to meet you.=
 *Wrath extends his hand for a hand shake*
            ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM
            Subject: Neo B=
east Wars


            Deemos looked at the CR Chamber when it beeped. Inz=
ola came out and looked around.

            "Maximal base, it's crude but =
it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laughed.

            "Who are you?" Inzola =
asked Wrath.

            Gangon's spark is still waiting.

            Art=
ist runs around in a circle, playing his stupid games he believed exercises=
 him. He runs away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into th=
e mountain and an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts pas=
s through his mind. Hours later, he awakes.

            "Oh, that was some=
 blow, but I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

            "Plintissa? Wh=
ere are you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He remem=
bered that she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were working, s=
o he ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

            "Pli=
ntissa dear? You don't remember me? For me death was near." Artist said. Pl=
intissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arms. Artist laughed and =
they kissed. After the kiss.

            "Do me a favor, Artist, stop usin=
g rhymes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

            "Okay, I won't rhym=
e, we'll have a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both laughed and Artist=
 took Plintissa to a grassy plain.

            Dracona held up her scannin=
g device in front of Scorponok's face.

            "I can find that device=
 I lost." Dracona said.

            "Then I'll give it to the Predacons, i=
t's a piece of my blaster, it is an ice gun." Dracona said. She looked at S=
corponok with big beautiful eyes. Sinister and Sinesis stared at her, mouth=
s agape.

            The Radicons sat there still...

--------------------=
--------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------
